#### Question 1
```{r, echo = TRUE}
#setting the input variables
x <- 1.1
a <- 2.2
b <- 3.3

#1a
z <- x^(a^b)
print(z)

#1b
z <- (x^a)^b
print(z)

#1c
z <- (3*(x^3))+(2*(x^2))+1
print(z)
```
